external.description: # Markdown Lexicons What if we could describe a lexicon in Markdown? I think it might be a really readable way to represent them. What do you think? ## An Example Let's suppose we wanted to represent some thing #### com.example.some.thing > A description of the lexicon |Property|Type|Description|...
external.title: Markdown Lexicons

record.text:
Wish #AtProto lexicons were easier to author?

Why not try writing them in #Markdown?

I wrote a #PowerShell script to parse this format out, and decided to give @pipup.social a try to get feedback on the idea.

What do you think?
